{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=ALLY-R2100 |revision=K |fcc_date=11/03/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |availability=new |type=wireless router, mesh node |fcc_id=ZTT-ALLYR1900 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N01GVSIAA |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amp Module;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;85728-11, 610RM, 1610, MY;3; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Amped_ALLY_XXXX |default_ip=192.168.3.1 }}
:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2100 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|ALLY 2100 Whole Home Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/ally21c.html}} "1244-01001429-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. ALLY Plus Smart Business Wi-Fi System (ALLY21C): * [[Amped Wireless ALLY-R2100K]] Router * [[Amped Wireless ALLY-00X21K]] Range Extender The ''Smart Business system'' uses the same hardware as the other ALLY systems but 800Mbps :is supported for 2.4GHz 802.11n presumably by enabling 256-QAM in software. ===Reviews=== *[http://www.networkworld.com/article/3161860/consumer-electronics/review-amped-wireless-ally-plus.html ''Amped Wireless ALLY Plus'' On '''NetworkWorld'''] *[http://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/8077/amped-wireless-ally-plus-whole-home-wi-fi-system-review/index.html ''Amped Wireless Ally Plus Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' On '''TweakTown'''] *[https://nerdtechy.com/amped-wireless-ally-review ''Amped Wireless ALLY Whole Home Smart WiFi System'' On '''NerdTechy'''] ===See also=== *[[Amped Wireless ALLY-00X19]] *[[Amped Wireless ALLY-00X21K]] *[[Amped Wireless ALLY-R1900]] *[[Amped Wireless ALLY-R2100K]] __NOTOC__
